ygData.subject: Re: Price Fixing
ygData.msgSnippet: Prices on banded should be at least as much as chain.  Smiths who sell lower than that are doing a terrible disservice to their fellow smiths.  All Verant
ygData.messageBody:
Prices on banded should be at least as much as chain. Smiths who sell lower
than that are doing a terrible disservice to their fellow smiths. All
Verant needs to do to fix this problem is make merchants pay a reasonable
amount for smithed goods, then we wouldn't see stupid things like people
selling at or below cost.
----- Original Message -----
From: <XxKommiexX@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 4:38 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Price Fixing


> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> or 500 plat....
